ðŸ“– Summary: IndexTTS2 is an autoregressive zero-shot text-to-speech system focused on controllable speech duration and emotional expression. It allows for precise control over the length of generated speech, independent control over timbre and emotion, and improved speech clarity in highly emotional expressions.
